Department of the Treasury 
Internal Revenue Service 
Credit for Small Employer Pension Plan 
Startup Costs 
a

a

www.irs.gov/form8881

130
Name(s) shown on return 
Identifying number 
1 
Qualified startup costs incurred during the tax year. 
Do not 
enter 
more  than $1,000

Credit for small employer pension plan startup costs from partnerships and S corporations    .    .

5

smaller
 of line 4 or 
$500
. Partnerships and S corporations, report this amount on 
Schedule K. All others, report this amount on Form 3800, line 1j
